content.en: Texture classification: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to improve the accuracy of texture classification. These algorithms include Gabor filters, Kohonen's SOFM algorithm, Gaussian Markov random fields, Grey level co-occurrence matrix, Gabor wavelets, circular orientation normalization scheme, elastic crossfrequency searching mechanism, and many more. By using these algorithms, scientists aim to develop efficient and robust methods that can classify textures accurately, regardless of rotation, scale, or other variations.
content.da: Teksturklassificering: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af teksturklassificering. Disse algoritmer inkluderer Gabor-filtre, Kohonens SOFM-algoritme, Gaussiske Markov tilfældige felter, gråtone sameksistensmatrix, Gabor wavelets, cirkulær orienteringsnormaliseringsskema, elastisk tværfrekvenssøgningsmekanisme og mange flere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at udvikle effektive og robuste metoder, der præcist kan klassificere teksturer, uanset rotation, skala eller andre variationer.
